predicate.note: Frames file for 'outpace' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, surprise surprise. No comparison.

roleset.name: move more quickly

example.name: arg2 as PP
example.text: Advancing OTC stocks outpaced decliners by 1,120 to 806.

example.name: arg2 as EXT
example.text: Declining issues on the New York Stock Exchange outpaced advancers, 1,012 to 501.
example.arg: on the New York Stock Exchange

roleset.note: "Outrun" will take the same framing, although the margin will usually not occur.
